title: Alyson Noel - [The Immortals 04] - Dark Flame-viny
description:
Alyson Noel - [The Immortals 04] - Dark Flame-viny


At the start of this mesmerizing new installment of the Immortals series, Ever is helping her friend Haven transition into life as an immortal. But with Haven drunk on her new powers and carelessly putting them all at risk, their friendship becomes more and more strained. At the same time, Ever delves deeper into magick in order to get control over her enemy Roman and free Damen from his power.
